video.title: My Big, Big Friend
video.synopsis: 6-year-old Yuri and pals Lili and Matt embark on adventures with a big blue elephant named Golias and other imaginary animal friends.

episodes.synopsis: After keeping a treat from his mother all to himself, Yuri goes on a pirate adventure and learns that it's more fun to share things with his friends.
episodes.title: Brickle Pickle / All the Way Up

episodes.synopsis: Matt is dead set against trying spinach, but he's left with no choice when he gets caught in a rapidly growing spinach jungle.
episodes.title: Hippo-licious / Clowning Around

episodes.synopsis: Yuri wants to fly his new kite all by himself but quickly realizes that sometimes you need the help of a few good friends.
episodes.title: Air Buddies / The Sneakers

episodes.synopsis: Watching his friends have a blast while losing at silly funhouse games, Matt realizes that you don't always have to be the best at something.
episodes.title: Skipping Stones / No Kid Is An Island

episodes.synopsis: Nervous to talk about his artwork in class, Yuri leaps right into his own painting to hide and winds up working through his fears.
episodes.title: Show and Tell / Perfect Princess

episodes.synopsis: Yuri is hesitant to learn French, but decides to give it a chance after a fantastical game of hide-and-seek in a place where you can only speak 'glerm'.
episodes.title: Count Glerm / Hair Brained Idea

episodes.synopsis: Worried that he's in big trouble, Matt tries to hide a note from his teacher at the end of a rainbow, but his conscience catches up with him.
episodes.title: Over the Rainbow / Lili's Tea Party

episodes.synopsis: Yuri has trouble with a game that involves improvising a story, but he comes up with a terrific ending after he goes right inside of it.
episodes.title: Tell Me a Story / Food's Up

episodes.synopsis: Matt's given what he thinks is a small role in the classroom duties but finds a way to make it a big one.
episodes.title: A Chance of Tomatoes / Time Out!

episodes.synopsis: Lili takes her friends on a skyward adventure to reclaim her lost poodle balloon, but she learns to let it go.
episodes.title: Missing Miss Puffy / Descent to the Downstairs

episodes.synopsis: Lili doesn't want to play a game for fear of getting her new dress dirty, but she soon realizes that getting dirty is half the fun.
episodes.title: Faeries of the Forrest / Diggin' a Hole

episodes.synopsis: Matt and the gang go on an adventure through Matt's messy bedroom to find his swim trunks, prompting Matt to realize the benefits of a clean room.
episodes.title: Fort Messy / Beach Blast

episodes.synopsis: Lili finds a pretty ring in the sandbox, and after a trip to a magic palace, Lili finds out what it's like to lose something precious.
episodes.title: Finders Keepers / Everyone's a Critic

episodes.synopsis: Matt learns how to play with others instead of over top of others during a larger-than-life music lesson at school.
episodes.title: Music Man / Dream On

episodes.synopsis: Yuri has trouble empathizing with Matt, who has his leg in a cast and his mood in a funk.
episodes.title: King of the Monkeys / That's My Spot

episodes.synopsis: Yuri's upset when he doesn't get the birthday gift that he really wanted, but after working hard to prepare a jungle feast for King Golias, he realizes that a gift made with love is the best kind there is.
episodes.title: It's My Party / Doggy Duty

episodes.synopsis: Lili finds out just how much she loves spending time with her brothers after she's forced to care for them during a train ride with her friends.
episodes.title: Derailed / Something Special

episodes.synopsis: Yuri prepares for his first-ever sleepover by practicing inside a snowy cabin and learning how to adapt his usual routine.
episodes.title: Sleepover / I Didn't Think of That

episodes.synopsis: Yuri learns the importance of giving someone new a chance after he tries to fill in for a sick farmer on a farm full of very stubborn animals.
episodes.title: The New Farmer / Perfect Picnic

episodes.synopsis: After leading her friends on afutile quest for a bee hive, Lili finally learns to admit when she doesn't know something.
episodes.title: Lili Bee / Flower Power

episodes.synopsis: Unable to agree on what game to play, the kids decide to split up and play by themselves.
episodes.title: No, My Game / Manly Matt

episodes.synopsis: Lili gets upset with Matt when he loses her sticker but later apologizes after venturing into a giant sticker garden.
episodes.title: Stickers / Matt's Fun Park

episodes.synopsis: Yuri visits the Land of Giants, where he's sure to find a giant who can make him big in a hurry.
episodes.title: Big and Small / Valentine's Day

episodes.synopsis: Matt decides that he'd rather go on a boat ride than go to his grandmother's house.
episodes.title: The Boat Ride / Hot and Cold

episodes.synopsis: Lili invents a game in which she always gets picked, but she realizes that even superheroes need to share the spotlight.
episodes.title: Super Lili / Holding It In

episodes.synopsis: In a battle of wills between Matt and Lili, it will take a singing soccer ball to show them how valuable (and fun) it is to compromise.
episodes.title: You Can't Make Me / Toy Drive

episodes.synopsis: Yuri wants to keep the class hamster but learns it would be unfair to the other kids; the friends realize that they should be kind to a new classmate.
episodes.title: Harold the Hamster / Caterpillar Dance

episodes.synopsis: Lili jumps to conclusions and unfairly blames the boys for breaking her toys; Matt and Bongo learn to use their imaginations to have fun anywhere.
episodes.title: Toybreaker / Stuck

episodes.synopsis: Matt and Lili try to make up with Yuri after they hurt his feelings; Lili learns it's fun to try new things when she has to take a karate class.
episodes.title: Hooray for You / No Way, Karate

episodes.synopsis: Golias teaches Lili that it's fun to do things differently once in a while; Matt wastes time complaining about his chores instead of finishing them.
episodes.title: Teacher Trouble / A Knightly Thing to Do

episodes.synopsis: Golias comforts Yuri and helps him face his fears; Matt and Lili get too competitive during a treasure hunt but then realize they are being silly.
episodes.title: Ready, Set… NO! / Orange and Purple

episodes.synopsis: All the kids learn how important their friendships are when Yuri is sad that he doesn't have siblings, and Matt and Lili make up after an argument.
episodes.title: One & Only / Sand and Flowers

episodes.synopsis: It's all about emotions when Matt learns to cope with angry feelings and Lili learns how to deal with losing something that she really loves.
episodes.title: Love Potion / The Pink Princess Nightgown

episodes.synopsis: The friends decide that they never want playground time to be over; Matt and Bongo learn that good things happen when you have patience.
episodes.title: Let’s Play Forever / Can’t Wait

episodes.synopsis: The friends learn some important lessons when Lili needs to be more kind to others; Yuri realizes he should be happy just being himself.
episodes.title: Toughen Up, Nessa / More Like Matt

episodes.synopsis: Matt learns that all he needs to do to cheer up his sister is to be himself; Lili and Nessa have trouble with their hobbies but they aren't quitters.
episodes.title: Amazing Matt / Don’t Give Up

episodes.synopsis: Golias and a dragon with a toothache persuade Yuri to go to the dentist; Bongo helps Matt deal with jealousy when a friend gets something Matt wants.
episodes.title: Dragon’s Den / What About Me?

episodes.synopsis: Lili learns that cooperation and collaboration make fun times even better; Yuri learns to accept that he can't control everything in his life.
episodes.title: What’s the Big Idea? / Ice Cream and Bananas

episodes.synopsis: Matt finds out how important it is to support your friends; Lili realizes she made a mistake by accepting praise for something that Yuri did.
episodes.title: Musical Chairs / Who Did It?
